qas.question: How many gardens and parks are in Miami?
In what park is the American Airlines Arena located?
Due to the presence of coral reefs, what activities are popular in Biscayne Bay?
In what neighborhood is Bicentennial Park located?
Why can outdoor activities take place all year in Miami?
How many gardens and parks aren't in Miami?
Outside of what park is the American Airlines Arena located?
Due to the presence of coral reefs, what activities are unpopular in Biscayne Bay?
In what neighborhood is Bicentennial Park not located?
Why can indoor activities take place all year in Miami?

context: Miami's <a4_0><b9_0>tropical weather<b9_0/><a4_0/> allows for year-round outdoors activities. The city has numerous marinas, rivers, bays, canals, and the Atlantic Ocean, which make boating, sailing, and fishing popular outdoors activities. Biscayne Bay has numerous coral reefs which make <a2_0><b7_0>snorkeling and scuba diving<b7_0/><a2_0/> popular. There are over <a0_0><b5_0>80<b5_0/><a0_0/> parks and gardens in the city. The largest and most popular parks are Bayfront Park and <a1_0><b6_0>Bicentennial<b6_0/><a1_0/> Park (located in the heart of <a3_0><b8_0>Downtown<b8_0/><a3_0/> and the location of the American Airlines Arena and Bayside Marketplace), Tropical Park, Peacock Park, Morningside Park, Virginia Key, and Watson Island.
